name: Cyberlight Runner
description:
Note: This game is in early early development, as such, the uploaded build is very rough around the edges

Cyberlight Runner has fast paced mechanics that rely on the players’ reaction time to be completed properly. Running, jumping, sliding, and timestopping are the core mechanics of the game.

Play as Kia, a hacker extraordinaire intent on uncovering the secrets of Cyberlight Incorporated, an incredibly prolific mega-company. Run, jump, and slide your way through three levels, each with their own unique twists on the core formula.
